screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .pspimage file in Corel PaintShop Pro 2023
screenshot.caption: PSPIMAGE file open in Corel PaintShop Pro 2023

description: Corel introduced the PSPIMAGE image format when it released version 8 of Paint Shop Pro (PSP), the predecessor to PaintShop Photo Pro. The format replaced .PSP files as the native format for saving images.
To create a PSPIMAGE file with PaintShop Pro:
